# Alpaca - Ask, Done.

<img src="logo.png" alt="Alpaca Logo" width="200" />

Connect and chat with all your apps in one place. Alpaca is an open-source AI assistant that works with your emails, calendars, project tools, and thousands more â€” all running locally on your machine.

## Features

- **Open Source & Private** - Your data never leaves your machine. Fully open source, no cloud.
- **Any LLM Provider** - Use local models with [Ollama](https://ollama.ai), or connect any OpenAI-compatible provider.
- **3000+ MCP Servers** - Connect to Gmail, Calendar, Notion, Slack, Linear, and [thousands more](https://smithery.ai/servers) through Smithery.
- **No Clutter** - No history. No threads. Just ask, and you're done.

## Development

```bash
# Install dependencies
npm install

# Start development server
npm run dev

# Build application
npm run build

# Package application
cd apps/desktop
npm run package
```

## Requirements

- Node.js >= 18
- npm 10.0.0
